channel.title: Aggroth || Nex || Summoning || Custom Rares || Flawless Skilling || Unique
channel.description:
Features:
24/7 Uptime Guaranteed Friendly staff and small community to get you started Custom Nex, Nomad, Giant Sea Snake and many more bosses Donator Zones for EVERY Donator Rank Dicer Rank for all of those avid gamblers, with their own custom zone, shop and crown! Custom Rares such as Black Partyhat, and White Halloween Mask Double XP Weekend every week! Ring of Wealth Custom Trivia system implemented Completionest Cape and Tokhaar-Kal Flawless skills, combat, and mini-games Custom shops No bugs or dupes Frost Dragons and Strykeworms Mystery Box and Donator Box for the ultimate prize Choose the Starter of your choice, the one that accommodates your needs! Dicing, and Gambling NPC's Custom Cluescrolls with valuable prizes Double XP and Quad XP Rings available in the server
Sincerely, Lunar, Owner of Aggroth Chris, Host and Webmaster
[url=http://www.aggroth.rs2portal.com]Website (We own the RS2Portal Website)[/url] [url=http://www.aggroth.rs2portal.com/webclient.html]Webclient[/url]
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/z1o1ziqt12adl5a/Capture1.JPG[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/lnr00rn2ufqb01e/Capture2.JPG[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/ezt1i4ewfq8hxca/Capture3.JPG[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/grwnb697atfw8n0/Capture4.JPG[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/kwng1n61drlknwx/Capture.JPG[/img]
